Hi there, I'm Harshit, a designer-turned-developer who's been working professionally as a dev. I'm a creative enthusiast and cover topics such as coding, tech, and anything I find interesting on my YouTube channel

My LinkedIn

About Me

I'm Harshit, a designer-turned-developer. I enjoy covering topics such as coding, tech, and anything else I find interesting. I'm no Mark Zuckerburg, but I can still build some pretty cool stuff.

Before fully transitioning to the world of dev, I was a graphic designer. Design is actually what I majored in in college however, after seeing David Fincher's magnum opus The Social Network in 2010, I was inspired to pursue web development and taught myself how to code. The rest is history.

When I'm not debugging or getting lost in documentation, you can catch me at the gym, a snobby coffee joint, the beach, playing videos games, or messing around with my camera gear. I enjoy all things tech and love picking up new skills. I believe if you're not learning something new, you're not growing.

Services

What I offer

Development

Visual Design,
UI / UX

Photography &
Videography

Development

Services with experience building projects for the front end

  • User interface developement from wireframes and mockups

  • Static website development for personal or business entities

  • Application development with frameworks such as Reach or Angular

  • Heavy focus on clean, compliant, and accessible features

  • Mobile first approach so project is viewable on all devices sizes and widths

Visual, Print, and UI / UX Design

Services with experience designing for web, user interfaces, and print material

  • Visual Design conceptualization for user interfaces, websites, and web applications

  • Print Design for posters, business cards, flyers, and other stationary

  • Emphasis on user-centered design for better experiences in applications and websites

  • Custom vector graphics, iconography, and digital illustrations

Photography and Videography

Services with experience with shooting photography and video editing

  • Photography services including headshots, portraits, editing, and touch-ups

  • Experince with editing and shooting long-form or short-form video content for the web
